name: 楊元森
objective: 本課程主要在提供學生有關計算機系統之基本知識及應用。授課內容包括：1.電腦的演進  2 .電腦的硬體架構(內部組件、中央處理機及主記憶體、輸出入裝置、資料儲存媒介與裝置)  3. 電腦的軟體(電腦系統概述、作業系統、資料組織與檔案處理、程式語言簡介、程式設計與軟體開發、資訊系統設計與發展程序)  4.計算機的應用　5.其它
schedule:
Week 01: Introduction to Computers
Week 02: The Internet and World Wide Web
Week 03: Application Software
Week 04: The Components of the System Units
Week 05: Input
Week 06: Output
Week 07: Storage
Week 08: Operating Systems and Utility Programs
Week 09: Midterm
Week 10: Communications and Networks
Week 11: Database Management
Week 12: Geographical Information System and Google Earth
Week 13: Computer Security and Safety, Ethics, and Privacy
Week 14: Information System Development
Week 15: Programming Languages and Program Development
Week 16: Enterprise Computing
Week 17: Computer Careers and Certification
Week 18: Final
materials:
1. Discovering Computers 2010: Living in a Digital World, Complete
(作者: G.B. Shelly & M.E. Vermaat, ISBN: 0495806811, 國內代理商: 歐亞書局.)
